EmailTemplate.description: Email to notify the sales rep that all tasks are complete and the request is closed
EmailTemplate.name: WRF Case Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Request has been closed - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
Thank you for your submittal for {!Case.ACCT_Name__c}. All tasks associated with this request have been processed and your request is now closed.
If you have any questions about this request, please contact the team that was assigned.
Your Support # is {!Case.CaseNumber} You can click here to view the request in Salesforce.com. ______________________________________________________
If a Pricing Analyst was assigned to this request and you would like to provide feedback on your experience with this project, please click the below link to fill out a short quality survey. Any feedback is appreciated and will be used to reward or coach our analyst team.
Post Work Survey
We appreciate the opportunity to work with you and hope our team can provide you with quality assistance in the future.
Pricing & Profitability
